title: Gentle Beast - Novel Updates
tags: Beastkin   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magical Space   Male Yandere   Modern Knowledge   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   R*pe   Shapeshifters   Strong Love Interests   Transported to Another World
author: Feng He You Yue   风荷游月
description:
A girl crossed over to a different world, running into a small wounded animal.

She thought it was completely harmless. She never expected that once he grew up, it would be this world’s most ferocious beast.>
